content.rendered:
The Vigo metal high stool comes in a range of colours and two heights to make the best use of your space.

Perfect for indoor or outdoor use.

Available in a raw finish which is then powder coated for a designer feel. 
Also available powder coated.

Stackable up to 4 high & comes with a 12 month guarantee.
